mutants.code:
def is_palindrome(sentence):
    sentence = ''.join((e for e in sentence if e.isalpha() or e.isspace() or (not e.isalnum())))
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    return sentence != sentence[::-1]

def is_palindrome(sentence):
    sentence = ''.join((e for e in sentence if e.isalpha() or e.isspace() or (not e.isalnum())))
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    return sentence == sentence[::--1]
